title: GTA+
headline: GTA+
subtitle: Exclusive Clothing
content:
GTA+ Members can cut a terrifying figure and scare the local populace by claiming the following clothing items through November 8:

— The Monochrome Striped Closed Suit
— The Skeleton Bodysuit
— The PRB Tee
— The PRB Shorts
— The PRB Hoodie

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
button: Select to sign up to GTA+
